name: Hyperrealistic Baseball III
description:
Defeat the evil umpires, pitchers, and sentient gloves!

Hyperrealistic Baseball III is a 3D Platformer where your goal is to get the ball to the top of the world with the help of your bat. Made during the University of Washington Game Development Club's themed game jam, One Action Multiple Functions, in Winter 2021.

Controls:

  • WASD / Arrow Keys: Movement
  • Space: Jump
  • Shift: Dash
  • E: Dash Jump
  • Q: Reset Ball
  • Left Click: Feed the ball towards the player
  • Right Hold: Charge bat
  • Right Release: Hit the ball in the reticle's direction / Launch a bat beam in the reticle's direction
